title: LatinExtendedConjugationLesson
description: A schema for a conjugation lesson in a Latin-based language.

title.description: The title of the lesson in English.

conjugation_rule_name.description: The name of the conjugation rule in English.

explanation.description: A clear explanation of the conjugation rule, allowing both English and the native language's characters.

infinitive.description: The dictionary form (unconjugated base form) of the word in the native language.

conjugated_form.description: The word after conjugation in the native language (e.g., walks, ate).

example_sentence.description: A full sentence in the native language using the conjugated form.

sentence_translation.description: The English translation of the example sentence.
